mapper.select: select * from free order by regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into free values ((select nvl(max(bno), 0)+1 from free), #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, 'admin', 0)
mapper.update: update free set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}
update free set visited=visited+1 where bno=#{bno}
